new type of general purpose neural netwo.:: Sparsely - Gated Mixture - of - Experts Layer ( MoE )

to.from sentence: Our approach to conditional computation is to introduce a new type of general purpose neural network component : a Sparsely - Gated Mixture - of - Experts Layer ( MoE ) .

trainable gating network.selects: sparse combination of the experts to process each input

consists of.from sentence: The MoE consists of a number of experts , each a simple feed - forward neural network , and a trainable gating network which selects a sparse combination of the experts to process each input ( see ) .

trained.from sentence: All parts of the network are trained jointly by back - propagation .
